import React, { useEffect, useCallback, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import * as action from "../../actions"; export default ({ id }) => { const [state, setState] = useState({ _id: '', productName: '', category: '', description: '', details: [], imagePath: [], price: '' }); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { data } = useSelector(state => state.productDetail); useEffect(() => { dispatch(action.getProductDetail(id)); }, [dispatch, id]) useEffect(() => { setState(data);; }, [data]) console.log(state); const handleClickAddDetail = useCallback(() => { const newState = state; newState.details.push({ color: '', size: '', quantity: 0 }); setState(newState); }, [state]) return (
